name: Static Wisp
description: A flickering fragment of corrupted sound.

name: Echo Glitch
description: Repeats your mistakes back at you in a distorted loop.

name: Vowel Shade
description: Eats vowels and leaves only consonant husks behind.

name: Scramble Imp
description: Rearranges letters when you're not looking.

name: Hush Wraith
description: Silences the voice that reads words aloud.
